contact.app_links: Find us on Google Play/iOS: SFS COLLEGE, BANGALORE

eligibility: Pass in 10+2 / Pre-University Course / equivalent course recognized by Bangalore University

karnataka_students: Class X or SSLC Marks Card
PUC / +2 / Class XII / Equivalent Marks Card (I & II Year)
Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last attended
Six passport-size photographs in formal attire
non_karnataka_students: Class X or SSLC Marks Card
PUC / +2 / Class XII / Equivalent Marks Card (I & II Year)
Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last attended
Six passport-size photographs in formal attire
foreign_students: Mark statements of the respective country equivalent to Higher Secondary
Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last attended
Ten recent passport-size photographs in formal attire
Copy of passport attested by a Gazetted Officer
general_conditions: Incomplete applications will not be processed
The applicant must be present for admission along with a parent or guardian
The candidate must satisfy all conditions set by Bangalore University
Final admission is subject to university approval
Transfer from one discipline to another is not permitted
documents_submission: Submit all original documents, copies, and a hard copy of the application form
Keep photocopies of all documents before submission
Originals will be returned after university registration or at the end of the program
To retrieve originals, the acknowledgment receipt must be produced

admission_process.selection_criteria: Admission is based on merit. Recommendations will not be entertained.

programs.title: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
programs.overview: The BBA program at St. Francis de Sales College is designed to nurture aspiring business leaders by providing a strong foundation in management principles, business ethics, and entrepreneurial skills.

specializations_offered.Marketing: Learn the art of market analysis, branding, and strategic sales management.
specializations_offered.Human Resources: Gain expertise in talent acquisition, employee engagement, and organizational development.
specializations_offered.Finance: Master financial planning, investment strategies, and risk management.

program_details.eligibility: Pre-university qualification from a recognized institution
program_details.campus_infrastructure: State-of-the-art facilities including smart classrooms, libraries, and technology labs.
program_details.placement_assistance: A dedicated career support team assists students in securing internships and job opportunities.

programs.title: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Aviation
programs.overview: The BBA in Aviation program provides in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in key aviation sectors including Air Traffic Control operations, Ground Handling, Customer Service Management, and Professional Skill Development.
activities_conducted: Industrial visit to Bangalore International Airport
Visit to the ATC tower at Bangalore International Airport
Industrial visit to Naval Aviation Museum, Goa
additional_courses_offered: IATA, Skill Development, Certificate Courses, SWAYAM
Introduction to Technical Records of Aircraft Lease
